Package camzup.core

Class Generative

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Generative
Direct Known Subclasses:
Simplex, Voronoi
public abstract class Generative
extends java.lang.Object
Facilitates simplex noise and voronoi patterns via hashing functions.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int DEFAULT_SEED
    A default seed set to the system current time in milliseconds.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static float hash​(Vec2 v, int seed)
    Returns a signed pseudo-random number in the range [-1.0, 1.0] given a vector input and a seed, based on the vector's hash code.
    static Vec2 hash​(Vec2 v, int seed, Vec2 target)
    Returns a vector in the range [-1.0, 1.0] given a vector input and a seed.
    static float hash​(Vec3 v, int seed)
    Returns a signed pseudo-random number in the range [-1.0, 1.0] given a vector input and a seed, based on the vector's hash code.
    static Vec3 hash​(Vec3 v, int seed, Vec3 target)
    Returns a vector in the range [-1.0, 1.0] given a vector input and a seed.
    static float hash​(Vec4 v, int seed)
    Returns a signed pseudo-random number in the range [-1.0, 1.0] given a vector input and a seed, based on the vector's hash code.
    static Vec4 hash​(Vec4 v, int seed, Vec4 target)
    Returns a vector in the range [-1.0, 1.0] given a vector input and a seed.

    • hash

      public static float hash​(Vec2 v, int seed)
      Returns a signed pseudo-random number in the range [-1.0, 1.0] given a vector input and a seed, based on the vector's hash code.
      Parameters:
      v - the input vector
      seed - the seed
      Returns:
      a random number
      See Also:
      Vec2.hashCode(), Float.intBitsToFloat(int), hash(int, int, int)
